title: I Don't Want My Mother-in-Law's Help - Part 2
description:
In part 2 of this call, Dr. Laura speaks with Sarah's husband on how to best care for his family. - Dr. Laura: "A husband's job is to protect, even if it's from his own mother."

Does your spouse take your side in issues involving family? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment. 

Find me on social media at:
